name: Trans-Atlantic
overview: A strategy trading game. You are the manager of a shipping line for 100 days - Congratulations! Your mission is to earn as much money as you can. You have 5 ships which start in London. You earn money by buying goods at one port and selling at another for a higher price on 8 different products. You are able to accept limited time contracts toward that end. Keep an eye and an ear out for telex messages about storms, contracts and other issues.
